tool_description: Get Historical Net Asset Values (NAVs) of any mutual fund in India registered with the Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI).
name: Mutual Fund Historical NAV - India
title: Mutual Fund Historical NAV - India

api_list.name: SCODE and Date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mfnavhistory.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mfnavhistory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mfnavhistory.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mfnavhistory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
